PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-01652016-03-24,  ,  TC,  , 
ActCanada Marine Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Port Authorities Management Regulations and the Port Authorities Operations Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PORT AUTHORITIES MANAGEMENT REGULATIONS AND THE PORT AUTHORITIES OPERATIONS REGULATIONS in order to (1) reflect the amalgamation of the three former west coast port authorities (the Fraser River Port Authority, the North Fraser Port Authority, and the Vancouver Port Authority); and (2) amend section 50 of the Port Authorities Management Regulations to account for the title change to the Canadian Institute of Chartered Accountants Handbook.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0066 Publication Date: 2016-04-20
AttachmentsAttachment
